title: 40 Most Innovative Western Based Farming Companies & Startups
description: This article showcases our top picks for the best Western based Farming companies. These startups and companies are taking a variety of approaches to innovating the Farming industry, but are all exceptional companies well worth a follow under innovation, growth, management and social impact.

title: Elzian Agro becomes one of top finalists in Expo City Dubai ExpoLive Innovation Program
description: Elzian Agro’s achievement was celebrated at the Terra Pavilion in Expo City Dubai, where they engaged with talented individuals from 37 nations who shared their passion for positive impact. Renowned for their groundbreaking technologies and sustainable farming methods, Elzian Agro stands as a frontrunner in the industry.

title: ELZIAN AGRO is Igniting a Technological Revolution in Agriculture
description: ELZIAN AGRO’s relentless pursuit of excellence have set new benchmarks within the industry. By pushing the boundaries of innovation, ELZIAN AGRO has paved the way for a future where agriculture merges seamlessly with technology, unlocking new realms of possibility.

title: ELZIAN AGRO, A Rising Star in Dubai’s Expo Live Innovation Program
description: In a world grappling with the challenges of food security and environmental sustainability, ELZIAN AGRO’s outstanding achievement serves as a beacon of hope and inspiration. Their unwavering pursuit of excellence, fueled by a strong commitment to innovation and sustainability, positions them as catalysts for change and progress.

title: ELZIAN AGRO is Igniting a Technological Revolution in Agriculture
description: By harnessing the power of technology, ELZIAN AGRO is leading the charge in transforming traditional agricultural practices into cutting-edge, sustainable solutions. ELZIAN AGRO’s resounding success is a testament to their unwavering passion for innovation.

title: ELZIAN AGRO, A Rising Star in Dubai’s Expo Live Innovation Program
description: ELZIAN AGRO, a prominent player in the agricultural solutions sector, has achieved an extraordinary feat by securing a coveted spot as one of the top finalists in the highly competitive Expo City Dubai ExpoLive Innovation Programme.

title: ELZIAN AGRO is Igniting a Technological Revolution in Agriculture
description: ELZIAN AGRO soared to new heights, claiming the prestigious title of National Winner in the category of Best Disruptive Product Innovation. Their transformative product has revolutionized traditional agricultural practices, leaving an indelible mark on the industry. By pushing boundaries and introducing cutting-edge technologies, ELZIAN AGRO has redefined the possibilities within farming.

title: ELZIAN AGRO Shines Bright at SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards 2023
description: ELZIAN AGRO, recognized as one of the top Technology Disruptors, garnered high praise and esteemed accolades in various categories, solidifying their position as a leading force in the industry. The company’s commitment to innovation and relentless pursuit of excellence was wholeheartedly acknowledged, with the team being honored in multiple domains.

title: ELZIAN AGRO: A Rising Star in Dubai’s Expo Live Innovation Program
description: Recognized as an industry pioneer, ELZIAN AGRO has revolutionized farming practices through cutting-edge technologies and sustainable approaches. description: ELZIAN AGRO, the trailblazing agricultural solutions company, has emerged as one of the top finalists in the fiercely competitive Expo City Dubai ExpoLive Innovation Programme.

title: ELZIAN AGRO honored at SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards 2023
description: Sri Lanka's tech industry was abuzz with excitement and anticipation as the prestigious SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards 2023 unfolded, celebrating remarkable achievements and groundbreaking innovations.

title: LASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards
description: We are thrilled to announce the National Winners of the prestigious SLASSCOM National Ingenuity Awards!These brilliant minds have redefined innovation and set new benchmarks in the tech industry. Join us in celebrating their remarkable achievements!

title: Putting an end to world hunger through smart agronomy solutions
description: Elzian Agro provides smart agronomy solutions through advanced automation systems for farmers who face extreme weather changes, pests, and diseases and have limited resources such as water, fertiliser, and labour.
